ygData.subject: One more problem with the not-so-new-anymore armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Besides all the camp problems, if our suit of armor was easier to obtain the first problem I would have is that PALADINS GET MORE WISDOM THAN WE DO with the
ygData.messageBody:
Besides all the camp problems, if our suit of armor was easier to obtain the first problem I would have is that PALADINS GET MORE WISDOM THAN WE DO with the new armor!!!
We get a pair of bracers +5 each (10 total, plz correct me if I am wrong (; )....

and paladins....

get a Helm that's +8 and vambraces that are +6 for a TOTAL OF 14!!!

I though Palys were only about 25% cleric....so then why do they get 40% more wisdom than us....

=(

(no meaning to disrespect palys but, plz verant make some sense)

------------------
Norin Grimsbane,
Cleric of Underfoot,
Tribunal Server.
